data.text: My sweet Grandma, I wish you to be always happy and healthy as today! Happy birthday my beloved old woman
May you stay healthy and happy for the years to come. We are all happy to have you here with us
When I look in to your beautiful eyes I can see an experienced woman who offered me love and protection! Happy birthday Grandma!
A grandmother is the second mother in a child’s life. For me you were my mother, sister and friend! I am very happy to be your grandchild!
I am very proud of you Grandma. Your kindness, love and wisdom are the things I wish to inherit from you. Happy and warm birthday.
Happy birthday to you superwoman! You always did the hard work in our family Smiles, hugs and greetings Grandma
You are the inspiration for me. Your wisdom made me wiser. Happy birthday granny
I had a chance to choose a new grandmother, I would choose you again! Happy and warm birthday
To my grandmother, my first idol, happy birthday
You are a big part of my life. I wish I will never lose you. Happy birthday to the greatest granny!
I am very lucky to have an amazing Grandma like you! You always kept your arms open for me. Happy birthday grandma
Happy birthday to the best storyteller and cookies baker. I love you Grandma
Wishes of a shining and lovely Birthday for a precious Granny
You are an angel on earth that protects me in my difficult times. Happy birthday Grandma!
Thank You for teaching me everything I couldn’t find on books. Happy Birthday Grandma
A very happy birthday to a very special lady in my life!
You are a part of all of my most favorite chapters of the book of my life, Happy birthday Grandma.
We are blessed because we have a grandma like you. Your mere presence is a breath of fresh air. Happy birthday, Grandma
Thousands of bright suns are not equal to the light which you bring, Grandma. May your birthday be full of light and music, just like you. Happy birthday
I am so proud have such an amazing person like you as my grandma. Happy birthday to you!
Thank you for all the years, all the stories, all the lessons, and all the memories. Here is to many more with you, Grandma. Happy birthday
From the bottom of my heart, I would like to thank you for being the most wonderful grandmother in the entire world. Happy birthday, my precious granny
Grandma, you are my angel and best friend. I can not thank my lucky stars enough for having such a phenomenal granny like you in my life.
I am the luckiest grandchild in the world because God has blessed me with the world’s most wonderful granny
May god bless you with a happy and extremely healthy life. Happy birthday, dear grandma.
